Detailed Description

Essa classe é responsável pelas operações de entrada e saída (I/O Operations)

Realizar a leitura de uma linha do arquivo de entrada (uma transação).

Parameters:
basket The basket that will be filled with the next row of the file.
Returns:
0 if the end of file is reached, otherwise 1;

unsigned long Input_Output_Manager::find_frequent_items ( const double  min_supp,
vector< unsigned long > &  support_of_items 
)

Determina a frequencia de cada item.

Parameters:
min_supp The (relative) support threshold.
support_of_items The support of the items. The ith least frequent item's support is given by support_of_items[i].
Returns:
The number of transactions that the basketfile contains.
